original_title: SEX OF THE DEAD 巨乳ゾンビガール
overview: First Installment of the Sex of the Dead series is set in a research facility. A busty maid who should have died instantly in a traffic accident becomes a zombie and revives, attacking researchers one after another!
title: Sex of the Dead - Big Tits Zombie Girl
